Text.Page: If you came to get Titus, I'll tell you the same thing I told the others. He the best engineer we have, and we're not sending him back to war!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Please! For the Goddess's sake!"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

For the Goddess? Hmm...alright. But we'll need something in return

The Iron Thorn orcans hijacked our shipment of Pure Steel Ingots. You go and get that some back, and we'll let Titus go with you.

If they're not keeping them in loot piles, they'll probably have the ingots on them.

Orcans have poor organizational skills."Alright."

Wow! You actually went and did it!

I mean, I knew you could do it. Well done.

I hereby give my consent to a temporary leave of absence for Titus. But I'm trusting you to bring him back in one piece!"I will."

Look, even if it's for the Goddess, we can't just let him go without something in return.

Get those ingots!
